message: Clicking 'Logout' only sort-of logs me out. If I want to create a second Convore account based on an alternate Twitter account, by clicking on 'Signup with Twitter' logs me in again under my existing account. Creating a second account by entering a username, email and password works OK. Why the difference?
Well I guess I still had a Convore tab open somewhere when I restarted Firefox. Still, it's a bit hard to shake off the Convore session.

@zenbat You can connect a second twitter account to a separate Convore account. You'll need to log out of Twitter though (and re-log in with the other Twitter account). Convore uses the Twitter account that you're logged into.

@leah I finally figured that out, but my own Twitter app (for example) always takes the user to https://api.twitter.com/oauth/authenticate where they can choose to use the account they are currently logged in to or log out and log back in through a different twitter account.
@leah just checked, I use http://twitter.com/oauth/authorize - maybe that's the difference
